document.full_text: general electric co , which helped build the fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant damaged by japan's earthquake and tsunami, will help the plant's operator supply electricity in the coming summer when power demand soars.
document.title: ge ceo says will help japan nuclear plant operator supply power
lines_and_colors: general electric co , which helped build the fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant damaged by japan's earthquake and tsunami, will help the plant's operator supply electricity in the coming summer when power demand soars.
